# Blueprint Session 2026-01-05-008 — COMPLETE

## Session Focus: Outpost-Based Generation + Metadata Fix

### Executive Summary

Implemented and validated Outpost-based Blueprint generation. Successfully generated Blueprints via Outpost dispatch without API fees. Fixed missing metadata block issue. Tagged repo v2.1.0. All tests passing.

---

## Accomplishments

### 1. BLUEPRINT_INTERFACE.md v2.0 → v2.1
- Created v2.0 with Outpost-based generation instructions
- Removed dependency on `ANTHROPIC_API_KEY` for generation
- Uses subscription agents ($170/mo) instead of API fees
- Updated to v2.1 to mandate metadata block in prompts

### 2. BLUEPRINT_SPEC.md v1.3.0 → v1.4.0
- Added mandatory metadata block to Document Structure template
- Created new "Metadata Block (MANDATORY)" section
- Documented all required metadata fields
- Validation rule: documents without metadata may fail validation

### 3. Live Tests: Outpost Blueprint Generation

**Test 1: CLI Todo App**
- Tasks Generated: 8
- Tiers: 4 (Foundation, Data Layer, CLI Commands, Polish)
- Duration: ~150 seconds
- Issue Found: Missing metadata block

**Test 2: Weather Fetcher (post-fix)**
- Tasks Generated: 3
- Duration: ~60 seconds
- Metadata Block: ✅ Present and correct

### 4. Git Tag
```
v2.1.0 → 8d05803977bc567647ed6bdfe626bd2986609150
```

## Architecture Confirmed

```
User Goal 
    ↓
BLUEPRINT_INTERFACE.md (contract)
    ↓
Outpost SSM Dispatch
    ↓
Claude Code (Opus 4.5) reads BLUEPRINT_SPEC.md
    ↓
Blueprint.md (with metadata block)
```

**Cost: $0 per generation** (uses $170/mo subscription, not API)

---

## Validated Metadata Block Format

```html
<!-- BLUEPRINT METADATA (DO NOT REMOVE) -->
<!-- _blueprint_version: 1.4.0 -->
<!-- _generated_at: 2026-01-05T05:22:00Z -->
<!-- _generator: claude-opus-4.5 -->
<!-- END METADATA -->
```
